description:
This course has been designed for business owners and anyone involved in project management, and will be of particular interest to Estimators, Builders, Engineers, Construction and Project Managers, Project Coordinators and Site and Works Managers or those intending to be involved in the area of estimating or controlling costs on projects. It is the introductory course to the ASQA Unit of Competency Manage Project Costs BSBPMG504A - which is part of the Diploma of Project Management BSB51413. Contact us at Exner Education if you are interesting in the Unit of Competency or full Diploma Course.

Please note that this course is priced in US dollars.
title: Learn Estimating & Cost Control
